page.title: 05CLUBS
page.content: Clubs(2) Village youth clubs meet at Wombleton and Nawton and are run by voluntary organisers. Nawton Youth club is based at the Methodist church and is well attended. This club also uses Ryedale School's sporting facilities. Some children belong to scouts and guides which meet at Kirkbymoorside and Helmsley. Many belong to the local Young Farmers Club. Local children are involved in the Duke Of Edinburgh's Award Scheme which is coordinated by a teacher who lives in Nawton. Other clubs to which adults belong include the Peace Group, the Bowls Club, Squash Club and the Pigeon Club.
